price: 28. Eh ngai, mawa na nagi; soki nazuaki songolo te moninga.
arabic: يَٰوَيۡلَتَىٰ لَيۡتَنِي لَمۡ أَتَّخِذۡ فُلَانًا خَلِيلٗا

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: yāwaylatā laytanī lam attakhidh fulānan khalīlan
